Text:
Starman (TV Series 1986–1987)


Starman : Season 1 Episode 1  “The Return” September 19, 1986

Paul manages to find his son Scott in an orphanage, but he has trouble winning the boy's trust.


VHS Master to Stand alone Recorder SP Speed to Ripped .mpg

Not out on DVD.
Thank you times infinity!  My long search is 2/22nds over!
Thanks a lot for this upload. I hope we can see the other 20 episodes soon.
